review: I have been unable to use.  There is something wrong with this product.  Everytime I go to an app to watch it keeps rebooting in the middle of the programs/movies.  I tried everything and called and was guided by your technical support staff - nothing!  Now, I am waiting for a new one.  In the meantime I've read reviews where this is a universal problem with the apps and Amazon's fire stick.  Let's wait and see when I get the new one if it still does it.  If it does - I'm returning.

review: So far I have been very pleased with the Fire Stick.  I am just tired of paying $70 a month for TV with 140 stations of which only about 8 or 10 are actually worth watching and several of those are iffy.  It is nice to sit down and watch a movie all the way through with no commercials breaking in every 10 minutes or so.
